title: Cape Town at dusk
caption: Cape Town at dusk
desc: It’s a beautiful evening here in Cape Town, South Africa. From this vantage point, we have a striking view of Table Mountain with its ‘tablecloth’ - cloud cover that typically shrouds the landmark. Cape Town is a popular tourist destination noted for its beaches, natural beauty, architecture and multicultural diversity - a showcase for the South Africa that Archbishop Desmond Tutu called the rainbow nation.
copyright: Table Mountain, Cape Town, South Africa (© 4FR/Getty Images)
